astralis-casino.name: Astralis Casino Components
astralis-casino.description: Complete library of animated casino game components for the Astralis brand
astralis-casino.author: Astralis Motion Team

ui-components.name: Premium UI Components
ui-components.description: Professional UI component library with modern animations and interactions
ui-components.author: UI Team

astralis-slot-machine.name: Astralis Slot Machine
astralis-slot-machine.description: A fully featured slot machine with spinning reels, win animations, and celebration effects
astralis-slot-machine.author: Astralis Motion Team

stateMachines.name: SlotMachineSM
stateMachines.description: Main state machine controlling slot machine behavior

inputs.name: isSpinning
inputs.description: Controls whether the reels are spinning

inputs.name: spinSpeed
inputs.description: Speed multiplier for the spin animation

inputs.name: winAmount
inputs.description: The amount won, triggers celebration animation when > 0

inputs.name: triggerSpin
inputs.description: Triggers a new spin of the reels

inputs.name: stopReels
inputs.description: Stops the reels at their final position

events.name: SpinStarted
events.description: Fired when the reels begin spinning

events.name: SpinComplete
events.description: Fired when all reels have stopped

events.name: WinSequenceComplete
events.description: Fired when the win celebration animation finishes

events.name: ReelStopped
events.description: Fired each time an individual reel stops

dataBindings.name: reelSymbols
dataBindings.description: Array of symbols to display on the reels

dataBindings.name: payoutTable
dataBindings.description: Configuration for win conditions and payouts

ui-loading-spinner.name: Premium Loading Spinner
ui-loading-spinner.description: An elegant, customizable loading spinner with multiple style variations
ui-loading-spinner.author: UI Team

stateMachines.name: LoadingStateMachine
stateMachines.description: Controls loading spinner behavior and appearance

inputs.name: isLoading
inputs.description: Shows or hides the loading animation

inputs.name: progress
inputs.description: Progress percentage for determinate loading (0-100)

inputs.name: speed
inputs.description: Animation speed multiplier

inputs.name: styleIndex
inputs.description: Index of the style variant (0: default, 1: minimal, 2: bold, 3: neon, 4: retro)

inputs.name: complete
inputs.description: Triggers the completion animation

events.name: LoadingComplete
events.description: Fired when loading completes and animation finishes

ui-interactive-button.name: Interactive Button
ui-interactive-button.description: A highly interactive button with hover, press, and disabled states
ui-interactive-button.author: UI Team

stateMachines.name: ButtonStateMachine
stateMachines.description: Interactive button state machine with all button states

inputs.name: isHovered
inputs.description: True when mouse is hovering over button

inputs.name: isPressed
inputs.description: True when button is being pressed

inputs.name: isDisabled
inputs.description: Disables button interaction

inputs.name: variant
inputs.description: Button variant (0: primary, 1: secondary, 2: danger, 3: success)

inputs.name: onClick
inputs.description: Triggers click animation and feedback

events.name: ButtonClicked
events.description: Fired when button click animation completes

dataBindings.name: buttonText
dataBindings.description: Text label to display on the button

game-character-avatar.name: Game Character Avatar
game-character-avatar.description: Animated character avatar with emotions, idle animations, and reactions
game-character-avatar.author: Character Design Team

inputs.name: emotionIndex
inputs.description: Emotion to display (0: neutral, 1: happy, 2: sad, 3: excited, 4: angry, 5: surprised, 6: thinking, 7: celebrating)

inputs.name: isTalking
inputs.description: Triggers talking animation

inputs.name: lookAtX
inputs.description: Horizontal look direction (-100 to 100)

inputs.name: lookAtY
inputs.description: Vertical look direction (-50 to 50)

inputs.name: triggerReaction
inputs.description: Triggers a one-shot reaction based on current emotion

inputs.name: wave
inputs.description: Triggers wave animation

events.name: ReactionComplete
events.description: Fired when one-shot reaction animation finishes

dataBindings.name: characterConfig
dataBindings.description: Character customization options (skin tone, hair style, outfit)
